channel.title: Deep Learning on PBenavides
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on PBenavides

item.title: Experimentation Notebooks
item.description: These are Proof of Concept Notebooks where I’m replicating some tutorial with my point of view or own data. I built this notebooks to keep a record of which use-cases I could make in the future and as personal note-taking of the topics that I’ve studied. Some of the topics I’m including in this notebooks are: Data_visualization: A calendar plot about USDPEN prices. FeatureEncoding Challenge: Kaggle competition about encoding techniques.

item.title: Data Science Introductory Course
item.description: While the pensioner of Ghent and his eminence were exchanging very low bows and a few words in voices still lower, a man of lofty stature, with a large face and broad shoulders, presented himself, in order to enter abreast with Guillaume Rym; one would have pronounced him a bull-dog by the side of a fox. His felt doublet and leather jerkin made a spot on the velvet and silk which surrounded him.
